Unknown.translation: The Omniprotector Lord who has many forms, appearing as Guru has given sermon to his disciples in person.

lines.gurmukhi: jg Bog neIbyd jgq Bgq jwih; Asn bsn gurisKn lfwey hY [

Unknown.translation: The God for whose propitiation yags are performed, food and offerings are made, the same Lord takes the form of Guru now coddling his Sikhs by distributing food and to his disciples.

lines.gurmukhi: ingm syKwid kbq nyq nyq kir; pUrm bRhm gurisKnu lKwey hY [35[

Unknown.translation: The supreme Creator, whom Shesh Nag and others have calling by innumerable names, now manifests as Guru showing Himself to His devotees (The Sikhs). (35)
